p: The respondents’ opinions indicate that they are currently aware of climate change based on present and past experiences of climatic change. Additionally, referring to the past to evaluate climatic experiences of the present is indicative of the unified present–past timeframe of Afro-polychronism. As such, the past is not forgotten, and erstwhile experiences of climate serve as a source of wisdom when assessing the present. Conclusively, Afro-polychronism does have an influence on how the respondents’ evaluate and show awareness of climatic changes which in turn will affect risk perception.
